subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Syracuse Coach Jim Boeheim has led a charmed life on the court, but if the N.C.A.A. puts the university on probation, now seems as good a time as any for him to retire.
snippet: Syracuse Coach Jim Boeheim has led a charmed life on the court, but if the N.C.A.A. puts the university on probation, now seems as good a time as any for him to retire.
